alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Alabama, including the following counties, Colbert and Lauderdale. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 619 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain fell earlier this evening, and lingering standing water will be an issue for another hour or two. Emergency Management reported numerous cars stalled on area roads in Florence near Darby Drive, and runoff from this flooding will continue over the next few hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Killen, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Northwest Alabama Regional Airport, Colbert Heights and Ford City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
